advancements.lumenfuchs.root.title: Lumenfuchs Studios
advancements.lumenfuchs.root.description: Lesser projects of the Golden Light.
advancements.lumenfuchs.the_dummy.title: The Dummy
advancements.lumenfuchs.the_seeker.title: The Seeker
advancements.lumenfuchs.the_seeker.descr: Perhaps even Dummies may be rebels.
advancements.lumenfuchs.purity.title: Ascended Being
advancements.lumenfuchs.purity.descripti: The shadows hold no power unto thyself.
advancements.lumenfuchs.damnation.title: Rotten Within
advancements.lumenfuchs.damnation.descri: You are one with the corrupt forces of this world.
item.lumenfuchs.dummy_attack.description: "A shard of the Dummy's grim power."
lumenfuchs.help.1:
Hello! Welcome to %s,
 a datapack whose main feature is the titular %s,
lumenfuchs.help.2:
an "entity" whose main hobby is to stalk you around,
 no matter how, no matter where.
lumenfuchs.help.3_a: To test the creature on your own, click %s.
lumenfuchs.help.3_b: To see all available settings of this datapack, see %s.
lumenfuchs.help.5:
All things you see here are currently WIP!
 Bugs are likely, features are lacking. Here be dragons!
lumenfuchs.intro.init.info: First time here? Try running %s for a start!
lumenfuchs.intro.reload.info: Your datapack got updated! Click here for a list of latest changes.
Change how the Dummy is rendered.
lumenfuchs.settings.category_misc.title: Misc...
lumenfuchs.settings.option_edit_bulk: Edit all settings to one value?
lumenfuchs.settings.confirm_edit_fail_bo: Please hold the %s book for saving this setting!
lumenfuchs.settings.confirm_edit_fail_ot: You must hold the book to edit this setting!
lumenfuchs.settings.read_only: Settings are read-only in this world.
lumenfuchs.settings.reset_first_load.des: Removes the "first load" flag, allowing any missing settings to be set properly.
lumenfuchs.settings.reset_first_load.war: Use to fix missing settings issues.
lumenfuchs.settings.reset_all_settings.d: Restores all settings to their default values.
lumenfuchs.settings.reset_all_settings.w: Warning! This is an irreversible action!
lumenfuchs.settings.lock_settings.title: [ Disable Settings Editing ]
lumenfuchs.settings.lock_settings.descri: Locks all settings as read-only. Requires operator privileges.
lumenfuchs.settings.lock_settings.warnin: Caution! You cannot undo this without operator permissions!
lumenfuchs.setting.ambience_presence.des: The sound played by the Dummy to all nearby players.
lumenfuchs.setting.ambience_target.title: Stalking Sound:
lumenfuchs.setting.ambience_target.descr: The sound played by the Dummy to its targeted player.
lumenfuchs.setting.material.title: Dummy Material...
lumenfuchs.setting.material.description: Change the block textures used by the Dummy.
lumenfuchs.setting.material_hurt.title: Dummy Hurt Material...
lumenfuchs.setting.material_hurt.descrip: Change the "hurt overlay" displayed by the Dummy when hit by a player.
lumenfuchs.setting.material.head.title: Head:
lumenfuchs.setting.material.head.descrip: The block texture of the Dummy's head.
lumenfuchs.setting.material_hurt.head.de: The block texture of the Dummy's head when hurt.
lumenfuchs.setting.material.head.additio: The Seeker's worn Pumpkin is unaffected by this setting.
lumenfuchs.setting.material.torso.title: Torso:
lumenfuchs.setting.material.torso.descri: The block texture of the Dummy's torso.
lumenfuchs.setting.material_hurt.torso.d: The block texture of the Dummy's torso when hurt.
lumenfuchs.setting.material.torso.additi: This also defines the hurt particles of the Dummy.
lumenfuchs.setting.material.left_arm.des: The block texture of the Dummy's left arm.
lumenfuchs.setting.material_hurt.left_ar: The block texture of the Dummy's left arm when hurt.
lumenfuchs.setting.material.right_arm.de: The block texture of the Dummy's right arm.
lumenfuchs.setting.material_hurt.right_a: The block texture of the Dummy's right arm when hurt.
lumenfuchs.setting.material.left_leg.des: The block texture of the Dummy's left leg.
lumenfuchs.setting.material_hurt.left_le: The block texture of the Dummy's left leg when hurt.
lumenfuchs.setting.material.right_leg.de: The block texture of the Dummy's right leg.
lumenfuchs.setting.material_hurt.right_l: The block texture of the Dummy's right leg when hurt.
lumenfuchs.setting.stare_player.title: Dummy Stares Player:
lumenfuchs.setting.stare_player.descript: If enabled, the Dummy will always look at the nearest player.
lumenfuchs.setting.stare_player_distance: How far can the Dummy stare players.
lumenfuchs.setting.stalk_player.title: Dummy Stalks Player:
lumenfuchs.setting.stalk_player.descript: If enabled, the Dummy will walk towards the nearest player.
lumenfuchs.setting.stalk_player_distance: How far can the Dummy stalk a player.
lumenfuchs.setting.stalk_player_threshol: The max distance a Dummy will approach a player before stopping.
lumenfuchs.setting.freeze_when_stared.de: If enabled, the Dummy will not move while being looked at.
lumenfuchs.setting.drop_loot.title: Dummy Drops Loot:
lumenfuchs.setting.drop_loot.description: If enabled, the Dummy may drop unique items upon death.
lumenfuchs.setting.harm_on_touch.title: Dummy Hurts on Touch:
lumenfuchs.setting.harm_on_touch.descrip: If enabled, the Dummy has a thorns-like effect against all creatures.
lumenfuchs.setting.attack_player.title: Dummy "Attacks" Player:
lumenfuchs.setting.attack_player.descrip: If enabled, the Dummy will perform an "attack" ability when near a player.
lumenfuchs.setting.attack_player_distanc: How close the Dummy needs to be to perform its "attack" ability.
lumenfuchs.setting.forceload_chunks.desc: If enabled, the Dummy will always forceload its own chunks.
lumenfuchs.setting.forceload_chunks.addi: May cause higher usage of resources; If your device can't handle the extra chunks being loaded, consider disabling this.
lumenfuchs.setting.natural_spawning.desc: If enabled, the Dummy can spawn on particularly dark areas.
lumenfuchs.setting.natural_spawning.addi: Works best in caves and when there is no light near the player.
If enabled, the Dummy can spawn in blocks exposed to the sky.
Requires "Natural Spawning" to be enabled to work.
lumenfuchs.setting.griefing.title: Dummy Griefing:
lumenfuchs.setting.griefing.description: If enabled, the Dummy can place and break blocks in your world.
lumenfuchs.setting.griefing.additions: Does not affect the initial "blast" of an activated Dummy Totem.
